scripts.cdk:diff: yarn cdk:synth && cdk diff --app 'node build/app.js' --profile finleap
scripts.deploy: yarn build && cdk deploy --app 'node build/app.js' ${npm_package_name} --output 'build/cdk.out' --strict --profile finleap
scripts.cdk:synth: yarn build && cdk synth --app 'node build/app.js' --output 'build/cdk.out' --strict --profile finleap
